column6: It's like a dream come true when Spider-Man is offered a big sack of cash by a wealthy socialite. But to get his webbed mitts on the green, he's gotta take on the Sandman! Maybe Aunt May's bills can wait another month...
column8: | colorist:Guru-eFX | penciller (cover):Antonio Garcia | inker:Norman Lee | writer:Sean McKeever | penciller:Patrick Scherberger
